section.p: As a marketplace owner, you can decide to use the defined categories for grouping the services displayed on the marketplace home page. For details, refer to .

You can at any time update the language-independent IDs and the language-specific terms of categories. The new values are available immediately to visitors of the marketplace and for assignment to services. The same applies when you delete a category: It is removed immediately from the marketplace and from the services it was assigned to. The sellers of the services are notified by email about the removal.
To create, update, and delete categories, use the Manage categories menu option in the Marketplace menu of the administration portal.
